title: Exception NameError: "global name 'FileNotFoundError' is not defined" in <bound method _DataLoaderIter.__del__ of <torch.utils.data.dataloader._DataLoaderIter object
body_html:
Hi,
I'm working with Pytorch 0.4, I got the FileNotFoundError Exception in functional.py when it invokes the binary_cross_entropy loss. Here is the stack trace:

loss += torch.mean(F.binary_cross_entropy(F.sigmoid(out0), all0) +

File "/home/local/.../anaconda2/envs/py27/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/nn/functional.py", line 1483, in binary_cross_entropy
return torch._C._nn.binary_cross_entropy(input, target, weight, size_average, reduce)
RuntimeError: cudaEventSynchronize in future::wait: device-side assert triggered

I'm aware of this type of issues like #6932. I added the fix in the locations suggested by the users in threads, however, the exception still occurs. I'd be happy for any help.
Best,
S.

body:
Hi,
I'm working with Pytorch 0.4, I got the  FileNotFoundError Exception in functional.py when it invokes the binary_cross_entropy loss. Here is the stack trace:

    loss += torch.mean(F.binary_cross_entropy(F.sigmoid(out0), all0) +
  File "/home/local/.../anaconda2/envs/py27/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/nn/functional.py", line 1483, in binary_cross_entropy
    return torch._C._nn.binary_cross_entropy(input, target, weight, size_average, reduce)
RuntimeError: cudaEventSynchronize in future::wait: device-side assert triggered

I'm aware of this type of issues like https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/6932. I added the fix in the locations suggested by the users in threads, however, the exception still occurs.  I'd be happy for any help.
Best,
S.
